Class RankingController

java.lang.Object

public class RankingController extends Object

    • getSortedRanking

      public List<Profile> getSortedRanking(RankingController.SortingParam sp)
      method that returns the list of the profiles in the ranking sorted according to the parameter sp
      Parameters:
      sp - : it can be one of the alphabetical order, the number of games, the number of wins, the level (every time a player reaches 100000 points the level is incremented), the total number of points gained in every game, the maximum score in a single game
      Returns:
